President’s Message

Dear Friends,

At IQ City Medical College Hospital, our mission has always been simple yet profound - to improve the quality of life through compassionate care and clinical excellence.

What began as a vision to redefine healthcare in Eastern India has today evolved into a centre of excellence in patient care, education, and research. Spread across the 100-acre IQ City Township in Durgapur, our integrated Knowledge & Health Campus stands as a living example of how world-class infrastructure and human empathy can come together to serve society.

From establishing the IQ City Medical College, IQ City Institute of Nursing Sciences and IQ City Institute of Pharmaceutical Sciences, to nurturing the IQ City Medical College Hospital - an 1200-bed multi-speciality teaching hospital - our efforts have been guided by one belief: that access to quality healthcare should not be a privilege, but a promise.

Every milestone we achieve is driven by the Mani Group’s four-decade-long legacy of excellence - a legacy built on trust, innovation, and a relentless pursuit of better living. Our experience across real estate, hospitality, and edu-health empowers us to build institutions that go beyond infrastructure - places where care, learning, and community thrive together.

As we look to the future, we remain deeply committed to advancing medical education, enhancing patient outcomes, and fostering a healthier tomorrow for all. Our pledge is to continue delivering care with compassion, integrity, and excellence - every single day.
